title: Lost My chest and Keys
body:
I lost my chest and keys when i opened my chest, the client crashed and i couldn't find it in my loot again :/ 
Any help?

replies.body:
I checked your account and it looks like you received the Pentakill Icon and 150 orange essence from that chest.

Let me know if you have any questions!
I have found that i had three keys but after opening my last chest it consumed all of my keys that i forged... Why might this have happened?

Hey Targon curio not the place for it but.. Do u know if riot is going to remove the thing of * Not Being Able to Earn Keys on champions u dont own*?  because it does become annoying at times if u play a champion u dont own and its like oh u could have earned this key fragment but u dont own this champion* now for chests i understand  but for fragments it makes no sense... and ive been told it doesnt count torward the over all keys a month.. tho im pretty sure it does.. because i can play all month champions i own and keep up with keys but if i play champions i dont own in like aram or normal or ranked and cant get that key u can  lose keys  like i keep up with all my chests but that  will cause me to lose around 1 key maby 2 keys a month if it happens at the worse time possible and thus it forces people to actually buy keys if they want to open the chest and be cleared of all chests

Hello this is concerning my account and when i got three fargments i forged it into a chest but when i opened it nothing happened and i didnt get anything Targon please help and please give me my stuff back if you cant get the reward back. Just letting me know what I got would be good. 

Ty
